A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I find that if you haven't been watching the previous films in the Star Wars saga\, you're going to have a hard time keeping up with the story. This chapter in the sequel trilogy also left me more questions that I'm hoping will be solved in IX.\nLast Jedi for me is a passable film. I don't find it better than Empire Strikes Back. I did manage to get some enjoyment out of the film\, and I praise its darker tone by killing off some significant Star Wars characters.
